steps.title: Board
steps.text: This is the barn: a 5x5 grid where the entire fight takes place.

steps.title: Incoming Mice
steps.text: Mice in the queue wait outside until both cat and mouse turns resolve.

steps.title: Cell Basics
steps.text: Cats and mice can be placed on the board, but only one piece fits on any cell.

steps.title: Entrance Squares
steps.text: Gate cells are where incoming mice try to enter the barn.

steps.title: Shadow Squares
steps.text: Shadow tiles boost both sides: cats can prime Shadow Strike, and mice that feed here grow stronger.

steps.title: Resident Mice
steps.text: Several mice already occupy the barn. We need to clear them out.

steps.title: Cats Ready
steps.text: Your cats are waiting off-board. Place them to begin the defense.

steps.title: Place Pangur
steps.text: Bring Pangur onto the barn.
steps.instruction: Drag Pangur to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Test Meow at Gate
steps.text: Move Pangur to a gate. His meow can deter incoming mice; filling all gates with cats scares an entire wave.

steps.title: Reset Pangur
steps.text: Return Pangur to the interior square to continue setup.
steps.instruction: Drag Pangur back to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Place Baircne
steps.text: Bring Baircne into the barn.
steps.instruction: Drag Baircne to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Place Guardian
steps.text: Place the Guardian cat on the board.
steps.instruction: Drag Guardian to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Confirm Formation
steps.text: Rearrange freely until ready, then lock in your formation.

steps.title: Selecting Cats
steps.text: Selecting a cat highlights green move targets and red attack targets. Cats move like queens.

steps.title: Turn Order
steps.text: Cats act first, then resident mice, then incoming mice enter from the gates.

steps.title: Attack the Gate Mouse
steps.text: Spend Pangur's catch to remove the gate mouse.

steps.title: Sweep the Shadow Mouse
steps.text: Use Pangur's remaining catch to clear the shadow mouse.

steps.title: Chip the Big Mouse
steps.text: Bigger mice retaliate. Start chipping the 3/3 mouse.

steps.title: Chip Again
steps.text: Spend another catch to drop the mouse to 1 heart.

steps.title: Finish the Big Mouse
steps.text: Finish the wounded mouse; killing heals the cat by 1.

steps.title: Stack Meow at the Gate
steps.text: Move Guardian onto the gate to add meow and deter the next wave.

steps.title: Position Pangur for Baircne
steps.text: Move Pangur adjacent to Baircne so his shield passive boosts Baircne's catch.
steps.instruction: Move Pangur to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Clean Up the Corner Mouse
steps.text: Use the boosted catch to finish the corner mouse.

steps.title: Park on Shadow
steps.text: Move Baircne onto a shadow tile to prime Shadow Strike for next turn.
steps.instruction: Move Baircne to the highlighted shadow cell.

steps.title: Show Pangur's Double Move
steps.text: Pangur can move twice per turn. Reposition him toward the remaining threats.
steps.instruction: Move Pangur to the highlighted cell.

steps.title: Stun the Strong Mouse
steps.text: Attack the 2/2 mouse to stun it; stunned mice cannot grow this turn.

steps.title: Cats End Turn
steps.text: Once all cats have acted, end the cat phase. Next, mice take their turn: they move or attack first, then feed (shadow mice grow), then new mice enter.

steps.title: Mouse Retaliation
steps.text: During the mouse turn, adjacent mice attack before moving. Pangur takes two hits from the 3/3 mouse.
steps.instruction: Advance the stepper to resolve the attacks.

steps.title: Mice Feed and Grow
steps.text: Feeding adds grain loss and upgrades mice on shadow tiles. Shadow placement matters for their growth.

steps.title: Incoming Wave Preview
steps.text: Meow from gate cats scares part of the wave. Scared mice leave the queue; the rest will try to enter.

steps.title: Incoming Placement
steps.text: Entering mice append to existing mouse lines if paths are open. Gate cats block entry on their cells.

steps.title: Next Cat Turn
steps.text: Once placement finishes, the next cat turn begins. Rearrange, attack, or hold gates as needed.

steps.title: Pick Off Gate Mice
steps.text: Use Baircne to remove gate threats and reposition toward shadows.

steps.title: Chip the 4/4 Mouse
steps.text: Work together to grind down the upgraded mouse on the shadow tile.
steps.instruction: Attack in sequence to finish it.

steps.title: Clean Remaining Threats
steps.text: Finish the 2/2 mouse and reposition Pangur across the board for future turns.
steps.instruction: Attack, then move to cover another lane.

steps.title: Guardian Cleanup
steps.text: Guardian removes the last resident from this wave.

steps.title: End Turn, Resolve Mice
steps.text: Finish the cat phase; remaining mice feed and incoming placements repeat.
steps.instruction: Advance through mouse feeding and incoming placement.

steps.title: New Wave, Same Plan
steps.text: With new entrants on the board, repeat the pattern: pick priority targets, hold gates, and park on shadows.

steps.title: Full Deterrence
steps.text: Six meow on gates scares the entire wave; no mice enter when meowge meets the wave size.

steps.title: Win the Game
steps.text: Cats win when all resident mice are gone and the incoming queue is fully deterred. Keep gates covered to seal the victory.
steps.instruction: Finish deterring or defeating all mice.
